author: Kometa-Team
install_msg: You have just installed the 'showcase_lockdown' cog. This cog will monitor specific channels and prevent new posts by deleting them, then remind users to post in the community showcase channel instead.
name: showcase_lockdown
short: Monitors locked channels and redirects users to the showcase channel.
description: This cog monitors designated channels (by ID) and deletes any new posts. It then tags the user with a reminder message to use the showcase channel instead. Existing threads within those channels remain unaffected.
